summary: This mod makes sneaking a lot more real and you will not 1shot everything, but neither it makes it useless. It makes it just fine.
descriptionHtml:
Every thought sneaking is too broken/overpowered? Of course you did if you played the assassin role for at least once, this mod fixes this.

Base values :

Sneak damage with melee weapons now deals x2 times normal damage (Used to be x3 for 1handed weapons)

So sneak damage with backstab now deals 4 times normal damage instead of 6, with assassin's blade 10 times normal damage. instead of 15.

Perk values :

Deadly aim : Now increases ranged weapon sneak damage to 4 times normal damage. instead of 3.

DB gloves :

the enchantment now increases sneak damage for both one handed weapons and ranged weapons by x1.5 times.

So with the base value you deal 4 one handed damage, with backstab 6, with assassin's blade 15.
With a ranged weapon you now deal 3 normal damage, with deadly aim perk 6.

Shadow warrior :

going into sneaking mode now grants you 3seconds of invisibility but has 10 seconds cool down.

1 second was too little. but the no cool down was broken you could execute as many sneak attacks as you want.
So this should fix it, more invisibility but longer cool down.


My mods :

Slow time shout : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84607/?
Balanced sneak damage (includes db gloves) : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84654?
